Models available in this package

Source: vignettes/1_Models.Rmd
1_Models.Rmd
library(Rcongas)
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'cli::num_ansi_colors' by
#> 'crayon::num_ansi_colors' when loading 'BMix'
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'crayon::%+%' by 'ggplot2::%+%' when loading
#> 'BMix'
#> ✓ Loading BMix, 'Binomial and Beta-Binomial univariate mixtures'. Support : <https://caravagnalab.github.io/BMix/>
#> ✓ Loading CNAqc, 'Copy Number Alteration quality check'. Support : <https://caravagn.github.io/CNAqc/>
#> ✓ Loading Rcongas, 'Copy-Number genotyping from single cells'. Support : <https://militeee.github.io/Rcongas/>

Models for clustering and segmentation available in this package are listed via list_models().

Each model has one code associated to it, which should be used as parameter for fitting functions requiring a model argument.

list_models()
#> 
#> ── Models available in version: 0.1.0
#> →            HmmSimple NA
#> →      MixtureGaussian Poisson-based mixture with Lognormal copy-numbers
#> →   MixtureGaussianDMP NA
#> →     MixtureDirichlet Dirichlet-process version of XXXXXXXXXXXXX
#> →        HmmMixtureRNA NA
#> →         HmmSegmenter NA
#> ℹ See the vignette 'Models available in this package' for details and examples.

Models for clustering

MixtureGaussian

MixtureGaussianDMP

MixtureDirichlet

Models for segmentation

HmmSimple

HmmMixtureRNA

HmmSegmenter
